title: [ML News] This AI completes Wikipedia! Meta AI Sphere | Google Minerva | GPT-3 writes a paper

media:group.media:title: [ML News] This AI completes Wikipedia! Meta AI Sphere | Google Minerva | GPT-3 writes a paper
media:group.media:description:
#mlnews #ai #minerva 

This episode is all about models that reason.

OUTLINE:
0:00 - Intro
0:35 - Meta AI learns Wikipedia citations
5:25 - Google's Minerva solves math problems by reading papers
9:10 - GPT-3 writes a paper on itself
13:35 - Jürgen Schmidhuber prompts LeCun for missing citations
